dillon.gameAPI.entity

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • dillon.gameAPI.entity.Entity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class stores the position, direction and sprite of an entity.
    Author:
    Dillon - Github dg092099
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setAutoPilot

        public void setAutoPilot(int mode,
                         Entity target,
                         int limit,
                         int speedMultiplier)
        Sets the sprite to target and follow an entity
        Parameters:
        mode - How it should move
        target - The entity it is targeting.
        limit - How many updates before recalculating the directions.
        speedMultiplier - A value needed to normalize the angles.
